original_text: All the rivers run into the sea; yet the sea is not full; unto the place from whence the rivers come, thither they return again.
korean_text: 모든 강물은 다 바다로 흐르되 바다를 채우지 못하며 강물은 어느 곳으로 흐르든지 그리로 연하여 흐르느니라

sentences.original_text: All the rivers run into the sea
yet the sea is not full
unto the place from whence the rivers come
